## ThrottlingError class

ThrottlingError indicates some capacity limit was exceeded and thus the request could not be served.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ThrottlingError extends ServiceError
```

<b>Extends:</b> [ServiceError](./fauna.serviceerror.md)
